Product / Service: LiDAR Scanning and Point Cloud Registration
Description: A scanning technician will perform the LiDAR capture and preliminary point cloud registration on-site. A registration technician will clean and register the colorized point cloud. Deliverables include: • Colorized Point Cloud (.rcp format) • Registration Report • Actual Square Footage Audit • Upon request we can deliver in E57, .xyz or other point cloud formats.

Any visible structural details of exposed ceilings will be included . Specific size, shape, location, and orientation will be indicated. Includes scanning above ceiling tile, where appropriate.

3D FEA element model compatible with SAP2000 (latest version) finite element analysis (FEA) modeling software (and other software listed below). a) A fine mesh model that follows the scanned point cloud data of the interior and exterior surfaces. Computed mesh should be a minimum of 1⁄4” deviation from point cloud scan. Mesh should be relatively small to capture the subtle differences of the as-built surface, with mesh vertices being approximately 3” maximum. b) A larger/structural analysis mesh that is an “average” between the interior and exterior surfaces. Mesh should be comprised of triangles with the following characteristics: i. The vertices of mesh faces are to be connected ii. Edge of each mesh face to be a maximum length of 3’-0” iii. Angle between mesh edges to between 50 degrees and 70 degrees. iv. Be exportable to a .DXF format.
